<<<<<<< HEAD
A heavenly hymne to the king of heaven. Presented in a sermon, by Iames Eglesfield, Mr. of Arts in Queenes Colledge ... Eglesfield, James, b. 1601 or 2.
[8], 31, [1] p.
Printed by Iohn Dawson, for Francis Eglesfield and are to be sold at the signe of the Marigold in Pauls Churchyard, London : 1640.
First leaf blank, lacking? Cf. Folger catalogue which gives signatures: A-B C⁴. Imperfect; upper margins cropped, affecting pagination. Imperfect as filmed; title page too dark, affecting readability. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
